issue.title: Simbody has trouble with pioneer2dx model and test

content.raw: @sherm1 I've been trying to figure out how to implement [SimbodyCollision::GetBoundingBox](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/93fe281a39e05683078a6cece51e8c59436705ee/gazebo/physics/simbody/SimbodyCollision.cc?at=default#cl-66). My first thought is to use [SimTK::ContactGeometry::getBoundingSphere](https://simtk.org/api_docs/simbody/api_docs30/Simbody/html/classSimTK_1_1ContactGeometry.html#ab54d1f8d2185432686c0120d7827a1d3), but [SimbodyCollision::collisionShape](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/93fe281a39e05683078a6cece51e8c59436705ee/gazebo/physics/simbody/SimbodyCollision.hh#cl-73) is never set. Do you think that could be set during [SimbodyPhysics::AddCollisionsToLink](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/93fe281a39e05683078a6cece51e8c59436705ee/gazebo/physics/simbody/SimbodyPhysics.cc?at=default#cl-1142)?
content.html: @sherm1 I've been trying to figure out how to implement SimbodyCollision::GetBoundingBox. My first thought is to use SimTK::ContactGeometry::getBoundingSphere, but SimbodyCollision::collisionShape is never set. Do you think that could be set during SimbodyPhysics::AddCollisionsToLink?
